content.title: You need to change your application
content.reason: You must have lived apart from your {{ divorceWho }}  for the past {{ limitYears }}  years to use this reason for divorce.
content.allowed: You are allowed to have spent some time living together, but only for up to 6 months (over one or more periods) and this time doesn’t count towards the {{ limitYears }} year separation period. You’ll need to have lived apart for longer to make up any time that you spent living together.
content.proceed: If you want to proceed with your divorce application, you must choose another fact which applies to you or wait until you have been separated for long enough.
content.yearsAndMonths: years and 6 months in the past.
content.livedTogetherMore6Months: As you have lived together for more than 6 months since then, then you can't use this reason for divorce at this time.

content.title: Mae angen ichi newid eich cais
content.reason: Mae’n rhaid i chi a’ch {{ divorceWho }}  fod wedi byw ar wahân yn ystod y {{ limitYears }}  blynedd diwethaf ichi ddefnyddio’r rheswm hwn dros ysgaru.
content.allowed: Mae gennych hawl i fod wedi treulio rhywfaint o amser yn byw gyda’ch gilydd, ond dim ond hyd at 6 mis (mewn un cyfnod neu dros nifer o gyfnodau) ac nid yw’r amser hwn yn cyfrif tuag at y cyfnod o {{ limitYears }} blynedd o fyw ar wahân. Mae’n rhaid eich bod wedi byw ar wahân am fwy o amser i wneud i fyny am yr amser y bu ichi  fyw gyda’i gilydd.
content.proceed: Os ydych am fwrw ymlaen gyda’ch cais am ysgariad, mae’n rhaid ichi ddewis ffaith arall sy’n berthnasol ichi neu aros nes byddwch wedi byw ar wahân yn ddigon hir.
content.yearsAndMonths: blynedd a 6 mis yn y gorffennol.
content.livedTogetherMore6Months: Gan eich bod wedi byw gyda’ch gilydd am fwy na 6 mis ers hynny, ni allwch ddefnyddio’r rheswm hwn dros ysgaru ar hyn o bryd.
